title: Wilderness Diary

properties.name: description
properties.value: For a list of every task sorted by certain requirements, see Achievement Diary/All achievements.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Wilderness Diary

For a list of every task sorted by certain requirements, see Achievement Diary/All achievements.

Wilderness Diary
Released 5 March 2015 (Update)
Area(s) Wilderness, Wilderness God Wars Dungeon
Members Yes
Item reward Sword
Lamp XP rewards 2,500
7,500
15,000
50,000
Taskmaster(s) Lesser Fanatic
Levels required
Total level: 954
 ----  ----  85
 60  64  90
 ----  ----  85
 ----  84  90
 ----  ----  75
 96  ----  75
 ----  83  ----
 ----  67
49 ----

The Wilderness Diary is a set of achievement diaries whose tasks are exclusively done within the Wilderness. Therefore, players should be prepared for attacks from player killers.

Lesser Fanatic's location.

Several skill, quest and item requirements are needed to complete all tasks. Unless stated otherwise, temporary skill boosts can be used to meet the skill requirements.

Rewards can be claimed from the Lesser Fanatic nearby the bridge in Edgeville, outside of the Wilderness. Note that the previous tiers of a diary must be completed to claim rewards of the next tier.

Contents

  • 1 Overview
  • 2 Easy
    • 2.1 Rewards
  • 3 Medium
    • 3.1 Rewards
  • 4 Hard
    • 4.1 Rewards
  • 5 Elite
    • 5.1 Rewards
  • 6 Changes

Overview[edit | edit source]

The rewards can be claimed from the Lesser Fanatic. He is located just east of the Edgeville jailhouse.

Skill Requirements[1][2]
15
20
21
 
121+
Quest Requirements
Enter the Abyss
Additional Requirements
None
  1. ^ Some skills may be boostable, review the main section for more details.
  2. ^ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.

Rewards

  • Wilderness sword 1
    • Always slashes webs successfully
  • Antique lamp worth 2,500 experience in any skill above 30
  • Wilderness lever can teleport you to either Edgeville or Ardougne.
  • 10 random free runes from Lundail once per day

Skill Requirements[1][2]
55
1[3]
52[4]
50
60
61
50
 
353+
Quest Requirements
None
Additional Requirements
Access to the Wilderness God Wars Dungeon
Partial completion of Between a Rock...
  1. ^ Some skills may be boostable, review the main section for more details.
  2. ^ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.
  3. ^ With 60 Agility.
  4. ^ With 60 Strength.

Rewards

  • Wilderness sword 2
  • Antique lamp worth 7,500 experience in any skill above 40
  • Increases the chance of a successful yield from ents by 15%
  • 20% off entry to Resource Area (6000gp)
  • Can have 4 ecumenical keys at a time
  • 20 random free runes from Lundail once per day
  • Access to the shortcut in the Deep Wilderness Dungeon ( requires 46 )

Skill Requirements[1][2]
64
75
53
66
68
67
 
+
Quest Requirements
Death Plateau
Mage Arena I
Additional Requirements
Defeat the Chaos elemental, Chaos fanatic, Crazy archeologist and Scorpia.
Unlocked at least one of the three God spells
  1. ^ Some skills may be boostable, review the main section for more details.
  2. ^ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.

Rewards

  • Wilderness sword 3
    • One free teleport to the Fountain of Rune daily
  • Antique lamp worth 15,000 experience in any skill above 50
  • 50% more lava shards per lava scale
  • Access to a shortcut to the Lava Dragon Isle (requires 74 )
  • Access to a shortcut to the Lava Maze (requires 82 )
  • Can have 5 ecumenical keys at a time
  • 30 random free runes from Lundail once per day
  • Able to choose your destination when teleporting through the Ancient Obelisks
  • 50% off entry to Resource Area (3,750gp)
  • Wine of zamorak found in the Chaos Temple (hut) and Deep Wilderness Dungeon will be received in noted form

Skill Requirements[1][2]
85
60

895+
Quest Requirements
Desert Treasure
Additional Requirements
Defeat Callisto, Venenatis and Vet'ion.
  1. ^ Some skills may be boostable, review the main section for more details.
  2. ^ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.

Rewards

  • Wilderness sword 4
    • Unlimited free teleports to the Fountain of Rune
  • Antique lamp worth 50,000 experience in any skill above 70
  • Free entry to the Resource Area
  • All dragon bones drops in the Wilderness are noted. (Note: This does not include the King Black Dragon, as his lair is not Wilderness affected.)
    • Noted lava dragon bones can be toggled by speaking to the Lesser Fanatic.
  • 50 random free runes from Lundail once per day
  • Increased dark crab catch rate

Easy[edit | edit source]

Items Required
  • Any alchable item
  • Chaos talisman, tiara or Abyss
  • Combat equipment
  • Any pickaxe
  • Any team cape (Team cape x, Team cape i and team cape zero work.
Skills Needed
  • 15 Agility
  • 21 Magic
  • 15 Mining
Quests required
  • Enter the Abyss
    • Rune Mysteries
Task Requirements
1. Cast Low Alchemy at the Fountain of Rune.
  • 21 Magic
  • Any item that can be alchemised
2. Enter the Wilderness from the Ardougne or Edgeville lever. None
3. Pray at the Chaos Altar in level 38, Western Wilderness. None
4. Enter the Chaos Runecrafting temple.
  • Chaos talisman or tiara, or access to the Abyss
5. Kill a mammoth (south-east of the Ferox Enclave).
  • Weaponry
6. Kill an earth warrior in the Wilderness beneath Edgeville.
  • 15 Agility
  • Weaponry
7. Restore some Prayer points at the Demonic Ruins. None
8. Enter the King Black Dragon Lair. None
9. Collect 5 red spider's eggs from the Wilderness (can be found in the northern part of the Edgeville Dungeon).
Players can drop and pick up the same spider egg five times. 		None
10. Mine some iron ore in the Wilderness.
  • 15 Mining
  • Any pickaxe
11. Have the Mage of Zamorak teleport you to the Abyss.
  • Completion of Enter the Abyss
12. Equip any team cape in the Wilderness (entering the Wilderness with one already equipped does not count).
  • Any team cape

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Wilderness sword 1
    • Always slashes webs successfully
  • Antique lamp worth 2,500 experience in any skill above 30
  • Wilderness lever can teleport you to either Edgeville or Ardougne.
  • 10 random free runes from Lundail once per day

Medium[edit | edit source]

Items Required
  • Any pickaxe
  • Any axe, preferably rune or better.
  • Anti-dragon shield
  • Combat equipment
  • Unpowered orb
  • 3 cosmic runes
  • 30 earth runes
  • 7,500 coins
  • 3 gold bars
  • Hammer
  • Muddy key

Recommended:

  • Charged Games necklace
Skills Needed
  • 60 Agility or 60 Strength
  • 60 Magic
  • 55 Mining
  • 50 Slayer
  • 50 Smithing
  • 61 Woodcutting
Quests required
  • Partially Complete Between a Rock...
    • Fishing Contest
    • Dwarf Cannon
Task Requirements
1. Mine some mithril ore in the Wilderness.
  • 55 Mining
  • Any pickaxe
2. Chop some yew logs from an ent (must be within the Wilderness).
  • 61 Woodcutting(not boostable)
  • Any axe, preferably rune or better.
3. Enter the Wilderness God Wars Dungeon.
  • 60 Agility or 60 Strength
4. Complete a lap of the Wilderness Agility Course.
  • 52 Agility
5. Kill a green dragon (must be within the Wilderness).
  • Weaponry and protection from dragonfire (e.g. super antifire potion)
6. Kill an ankou in the Wilderness.
  • Weaponry
7. Charge an earth orb.
  • 60 Magic and means to cast Charge Earth Orb ( 30 3 and an unpowered orb)
8. Kill a bloodveld in the Wilderness God Wars Dungeon.
  • 50 Slayer
  • Weaponry and God equipment to keep the gods' followers passive.
  • Tip: Kill a Spiritual warrior as well (requires 68 Slayer) to complete a hard Wilderness diary task
9. Talk to the Emblem Trader in Edgeville about emblems. None
10. Smith a Gold helmet in the Resource Area.
Note that you cannot do this while you already have a gold helmet in your inventory or bank. This must be removed first.
  • Partial completion of Between a Rock...
  • 50 Smithing
  • 7500 coins, 3 gold bars and a hammer
  • Tip: Mine some mithril ore with a pickaxe to complete another medium task there
11. Open the muddy chest in the Lava Maze.
  • Muddy key and a knife or slashing weapon; food and armour strongly recommended
  • Tip: Fish a Raw lava eel here to complete a hard Wilderness diary task, requiring 53 Fishing, Oily fishing rod, and fishing bait.

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Wilderness sword 2
  • Antique lamp worth 7,500 experience in any skill above 40
  • Increases the chance of a successful yield from ents by 15%
  • 20% off entry to Resource Area (6000gp)
  • Can have 4 ecumenical keys at a time
  • 20 random free runes from Lundail once per day
  • Access to the shortcut in the Deep Wilderness Dungeon (requires 46 )

Hard[edit | edit source]

Items Required
  • Saradomin, Guthix, Zamorak Staff or Void knight mace
  • 2 blood runes
  • 2 fire runes
  • Unpowered orb
  • 3 cosmic runes
  • 34 air runes
  • Small fishing net
  • Rope
  • Hammer
  • About 6,000 coins
  • 2 adamantite bar
  • Combat equipment
  • Anti-dragon shield
  • Oily fishing rod
  • Fishing bait
  • Knife or Slash weapon
Skills Needed
  • 64 Agility
  • 53 Fishing
  • 67 Hunter (boostable)
  • 66 Magic
  • 68 Slayer (boostable)
  • 75 Smithing (boostable)
Quests required
  • Death Plateau
  • Mage Arena I
Task Requirements
1. Cast any of the three God spells against another player in the Wilderness (splashing does not count).
  • Completion of Mage Arena I
  • Any staff that can cast god spells and the runes to cast one of them (1-4 1-4 2 )
  • Note: God spells can always be cast within the Mage Arena. Casting any God spell on a player while inside the Mage Arena will count for the achievement, without unlocking it for outside use.
    However, to unlock the ability to cast a god spell outside of the arena, you must first cast it 100 times there.
2. Charge an air orb.
  • 66 Magic and means to cast Charge Air Orb (30 3 and an unpowered orb)
3. Catch a black salamander.
  • 67 Hunter
  • Small fishing net and a rope
4. Smith an adamant scimitar in the Resource Area.
  • 75 Smithing
  • Hammer, 7500 coins (or 6000 if the medium diary rewards have been claimed) and 2 adamantite bars
  • Tip: Cut and burn some Magic logs here for an elite task, requiring 75 Woodcutting and 75 Firemaking, a Tinderbox, and any axe
5. Kill a lava dragon and bury the bones on Lava Dragon Isle.
  • Weaponry and protection from dragonfire (e.g. super antifire potion)
  • Note: Grabbing the bones with Telekinetic Grab will not count towards the task
6. Kill the Chaos Elemental.
  • Combat equipment
7. Kill the Crazy archaeologist, Chaos Fanatic & Scorpia.
Note: Completing any other task, including those from other diaries, will reset the progress for this task.
  • Combat equipment
8. Take the Agility Shortcut from Trollheim into the Wilderness.

Note: This shortcut is the one due east of Trollheim, NOT the northern one near God Wars Dungeon.

  • Completion of Death Plateau
  • 64 Agility
9. Kill a spiritual warrior in the Wilderness God Wars Dungeon.
  • 68 Slayer
  • Weaponry and God equipment to keep the gods' followers passive.
10. Fish some raw lava eel in the Wilderness.
  • 53 Fishing
  • Oily fishing rod, fishing bait and a knife or slashing weapon

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Wilderness sword 3
    • One free teleport to the Fountain of Rune daily
  • Antique lamp worth 15,000 experience in any skill above 50
  • 50% more lava shards per lava scale
  • Access to a shortcut to the Lava Dragon Isle (requires 74 )
  • Access to a shortcut to the Lava Maze (requires 82 )
  • Can have 5 ecumenical keys at a time
  • 30 random free runes from Lundail once per day
  • Able to choose your destination when teleporting through the Ancient Obelisks
  • 50% off entry to Resource Area (3,750gp)
  • Wine of zamorak found in the Chaos Temple (hut) and Deep Wilderness Dungeon will be received in noted form

Elite[edit | edit source]

Items Required
  • Combat equipment
  • Hammer
  • 2 law runes
  • 8 water runes
  • Lobster pot
  • Dark fishing bait
  • About 3750 coins
  • Any pickaxe
  • Any axe
  • Tinderbox
Skills Needed
  • 60 Agility
  • 90 Cooking
  • 75 Firemaking
  • 85 Fishing
  • 96 Magic
  • 85 Mining
  • 83 Slayer
  • 90 Smithing
  • 60 Strength
  • 84 Thieving
  • 75 Woodcutting
Quests required
  • Desert Treasure
    • Priest in Peril
    • Waterfall Quest
    • Temple of Ikov
    • The Tourist Trap
    • The Dig Site
      • Druidic Ritual
    • Troll Stronghold
      • Death Plateau
Task Requirements
1. Kill Callisto, Venenatis & Vet'ion.
Note: Completing any other task, including those from other diaries, will reset the progress for this task.
  • Combat equipment
2. Teleport to Ghorrock.
  • Completion of Desert Treasure
  • 96 Magic and means to cast Ghorrock Teleport ( 8 2 )
3. Fish and cook a dark crab in the Resource Area.
  • 85 Fishing and 90 Cooking
  • Lobster pot, dark fishing bait and 7500 coins (or 6000/3750 if the medium/hard diary rewards have been claimed)
4. Smith a rune scimitar from scratch in the Resource Area.
You must kill two Runite Golems and mine them, then smelt the ore in the nearby furnace and smith the scimitar on the anvil.
  • 85 Mining and 90 Smithing
  • Weaponry, any pickaxe, hammer, 16 coal and 7500 coins (or 6000/3750 if the medium/hard diary rewards have been claimed)
5. Steal from the Chest (Rogues' Castle).
  • 84 Thieving
6. Slay a spiritual mage inside the Wilderness God Wars Dungeon.
  • 83 Slayer and either 60 Agility or 60 Strength
  • Weaponry and God equipment to keep the gods' followers passive.
7. Cut and burn some magic logs in the Resource Area.
  • 75 Woodcutting and 75 Firemaking
  • Any axe, tinderbox and 7500 coins (or 6000/3750 if the medium/hard diary rewards have been claimed)

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Wilderness sword 4
    • Unlimited free teleports to the Fountain of Rune
  • Antique lamp worth 50,000 experience in any skill above 70
  • Free entry to the Resource Area
  • All dragon bones drops in the Wilderness are noted. (Note: This does not include the King Black Dragon, as his lair is not in the Wilderness.)
    • Noted lava dragon bones can be toggled by speaking to the Lesser Fanatic.
  • 50 random free runes from Lundail once per day
  • Increased dark crab catch rate

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
16 July 2015
(update)

Fixed misspelling of "receive" in Ardougne, Karamja, Morytania and Wilderness Diaries.

30 April 2015
(update)

You must now kill each of the demi-bosses and wilderness bosses to complete each of the respective tasks.

Equip any [[team cape]] in the [[Wilderness]] (entering the Wilderness with one already equipped does not count). | *Any [[team cape]] |- |} ===Rewards=== *[[Wilderness sword 1]] **Always slashes webs successfully *[[Antique lamp]] worth 2,500 experience in any skill above 30 *[[Wilderness lever]] can teleport you to either [[Edgeville]] or [[Ardougne]]. *10 random free [[runes]] from [[Lundail]] once per day ==Medium== {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Items Required |- | {{Checklist| *Any [[pickaxe]] *Any [[axe]], preferably [[rune axe|rune]] or better. *[[Anti-dragon shield]] *[[Combat equipment]] *[[Unpowered orb]] *3 [[cosmic runes]] *30 [[earth runes]] *7,500 [[coins]] *3 [[gold bar]]s *[[Hammer]] *[[Muddy key]] '''Recommended:''' *Charged [[Games necklace]] }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Skills Needed |- | {{Checklist| *{{SCP|Agility|60|link=yes}} or {{SCP|Strength|60|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Magic|60|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Mining|55|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Slayer|50|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Smithing|50|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Woodcutting|61|link=yes}} }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Quests required |- | {{Checklist|smallindent=yes|notoggleparent=yes| *Partially Complete [[Between a Rock...]] **[[Fishing Contest]] **[[Dwarf Cannon]] }} |} {| class="wikitable lighttable qc-active diary-table" style=width:750px; data-diary-name="Wilderness" data-diary-tier="Medium" ! style="width:50%;" | Task ! style="width:50%;" | Requirements |- |1. Mine some [[mithril ore]] in the [[Wilderness]]. | *{{SCP|Mining|55|link=y}} *Any [[pickaxe]] |- |2. Chop some [[yew logs]] from an [[ent]] (must be within the Wilderness). | *{{SCP|Woodcutting|61|link=y}}{{Boostable|no}} *Any [[axe]], preferably [[rune axe|rune]] or better. |- |3. Enter the [[Wilderness God Wars Dungeon]]. | *{{SCP|Agility|60|link=y}} or {{SCP|Strength|60|link=y}} |- |4. Complete a lap of the [[Wilderness Agility Course]]. | *{{SCP|Agility|52|link=y}} |- |5. Kill a [[green dragon]] (must be within the Wilderness). | *[[Weaponry]] and protection from [[dragonfire]] (e.g. [[super antifire potion]]) |- |6. Kill an [[ankou]] in the [[Wilderness]]. | *[[Weaponry]] |- |7. [[Charge Earth Orb|Charge]] an [[earth orb]]. | *{{SCP|Magic|60|link=y}} and means to cast [[Charge Earth Orb]] ({{RuneReq|Cosmic=3|Earth=30}} and an [[unpowered orb]]) |- |8. Kill a [[bloodveld]] in the [[Wilderness God Wars Dungeon]]. | *{{SCP|Slayer|50|link=y}} *[[Weaponry]] and [[God item|God equipment]] to keep the gods' followers passive. *Tip: Kill a [[Spiritual warrior]] as well (requires {{SCP|Slayer|68|link=y}}) to complete a hard Wilderness diary task |- |9. Talk to the [[Emblem Trader]] in [[Edgeville]] about emblems. |{{NA|None}} |- |10. Smith a [[Gold helmet]] in the [[Resource Area]].
''Note that you cannot do this while you already have a gold helmet in your inventory or bank. This must be removed first. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Partial completion of [[Between a Rock...]] *{{SCP|Smithing|50|link=y}} *7500 [[coins]], 3 [[gold bar]]s and a [[hammer]] *'''''Tip:''' Mine some [[mithril ore]] with a [[pickaxe]] to complete another medium task there |- |11. Open the [[muddy chest]] in the [[Lava Maze]]. | *[[Muddy key]] and a [[knife]] or [[slashing]] weapon; food and armour '''strongly''' recommended *'''''Tip:''' Fish a [[Raw lava eel]] here to complete a hard Wilderness diary task, requiring {{SCP|Fishing|53|link=y}}, [[Oily fishing rod]], and [[fishing bait]].'' |} ===Rewards=== *[[Wilderness sword 2]] *[[Antique lamp]] worth 7,500 experience in any skill above 40 *Increases the chance of a successful yield from [[ent]]s by 15% *20% off entry to [[Resource Area]] (6000gp) *Can have 4 [[ecumenical key]]s at a time *20 random free [[runes]] from [[Lundail]] once per day *Access to the shortcut in the [[Deep Wilderness Dungeon]] (requires {{SCP|Agility|46}}) ==Hard== {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Items Required |- | {{Checklist| *[[Saradomin staff|Saradomin]], [[Guthix staff|Guthix]], [[Zamorak Staff]] or [[Void knight mace]] *2 [[blood rune]]s *2 [[fire rune]]s *[[Unpowered orb]] *3 [[cosmic runes]] *34 [[air runes]] *[[Small fishing net]] *[[Rope]] *[[Hammer]] *About 6,000 [[coins]] *2 [[adamantite bar]] *[[Combat equipment]] *[[Anti-dragon shield]] *[[Oily fishing rod]] *[[Fishing bait]] *[[Knife]] or [[Slash weapon]] }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Skills Needed |- | {{Checklist| *{{SCP|Agility|64|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Fishing|53|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Hunter|67|link=yes}} {{Boostable|yes}} *{{SCP|Magic|66|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Slayer|68|link=yes}} {{Boostable|yes}} *{{SCP|Smithing|75|link=yes}} {{Boostable|yes}} }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Quests required |- | {{Checklist|smallindent=yes|notoggleparent=yes| *[[Death Plateau]] *[[Mage Arena I]] }} |} {| class="wikitable lighttable qc-active diary-table" style=width:750px; data-diary-name="Wilderness" data-diary-tier="Hard" ! style="width:50%;" | Task ! style="width:50%;" | Requirements |- |1. Cast any of the three [[God spells]] against another player in the [[Wilderness]] (splashing does not count). | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Mage Arena I]] *Any staff that can cast [[god spells]] and the runes to cast one of them ({{RuneReq|Blood=2|Fire=1-4|Air=1-4}}) *'''''Note:''' God spells can always be cast within the [[Mage Arena]]. Casting any God spell on a player while inside the Mage Arena will count for the achievement, without unlocking it for outside use.
However, to unlock the ability to cast a god spell outside of the arena, you must first cast it 100 times there.'' |- |2. [[Charge Air Orb|Charge]] an [[air orb]]. | *{{SCP|Magic|66|link=y}} and means to cast [[Charge Air Orb]] ({{RuneReq|Air=30|Cosmic=3}} and an [[unpowered orb]]) |- |3. Catch a [[Black salamander (Hunter)|black salamander]]. | *{{SCP|Hunter|67|link=y}} *[[Small fishing net]] and a [[rope]] |- |4. Smith an [[adamant scimitar]] in the [[Resource Area]]. | *{{SCP|Smithing|75|link=y}} *[[Hammer]], 7500 [[coins]] (or 6000 if the medium diary rewards have been claimed) and 2 [[adamantite bar]]s *'''''Tip:''' Cut and burn some [[Magic logs]] here for an elite task, requiring {{SCP|Woodcutting|75|link=y}} and {{SCP|Firemaking|75|link=y}}, a [[Tinderbox]], and any axe'' |- |5. Kill a [[lava dragon]] and bury the [[Lava dragon bones|bones]] on [[Lava Dragon Isle]]. | *[[Weaponry]] and protection from [[dragonfire]] (e.g. [[super antifire potion]]) *'''''Note:''' Grabbing the bones with [[Telekinetic Grab]] will '''not''' count towards the task |- |6. Kill the [[Chaos Elemental]]. | *[[Combat equipment]] |- |7. Kill the [[Crazy archaeologist]], [[Chaos Fanatic]] & [[Scorpia]].
'''''Note:''' Completing any other task, including those from other diaries, will reset the progress for this task. | *[[Combat equipment]] |- |8. Take the Agility Shortcut from [[Trollheim]] into the [[Wilderness]]. '''''Note:''' This shortcut is the one due east of Trollheim, NOT the northern one near God Wars Dungeon.'' | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Death Plateau]] *{{SCP|Agility|64|link=y}} |- |9. Kill a [[spiritual warrior]] in the [[Wilderness God Wars Dungeon]]. | *{{SCP|Slayer|68|link=y}} *[[Weaponry]] and [[God item|God equipment]] to keep the gods' followers passive. |- |10. Fish some [[raw lava eel]] in the [[Wilderness]]. | *{{SCP|Fishing|53|link=y}} *[[Oily fishing rod]], [[fishing bait]] and a [[knife]] or [[slashing]] weapon |} ===Rewards=== *[[Wilderness sword 3]] **One free teleport to the [[Fountain of Rune]] daily *[[Antique lamp]] worth 15,000 experience in any skill above 50 *50% more [[Lava scale shard|lava shards]] per [[lava scale]] *Access to a shortcut to the [[Lava Dragon Isle]] (requires {{SCP|Agility|74}}) *Access to a shortcut to the [[Lava Maze]] (requires {{SCP|Agility|82}}) *Can have 5 [[ecumenical key]]s at a time *30 random free runes from [[Lundail]] once per day *Able to choose your destination when teleporting through the [[Wilderness Obelisk|Ancient Obelisks]] *50% off entry to [[Resource Area]] (3,750gp) *[[Wine of zamorak]] found in the [[Chaos Temple (hut)]] and [[Deep Wilderness Dungeon]] will be received in noted form ==Elite== {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Items Required |- | {{Checklist| *[[Combat equipment]] *[[Hammer]] *2 [[law rune]]s *8 [[water rune]]s *[[Lobster pot]] *[[Dark fishing bait]] *About 3750 [[coins]] *Any [[pickaxe]] *Any [[axe]] *[[Tinderbox]] }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Skills Needed |- | {{Checklist| *{{SCP|Agility|60|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Cooking|90|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Firemaking|75|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Fishing|85|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Magic|96|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Mining|85|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Slayer|83|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Smithing|90|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Strength|60|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Thieving|84|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Woodcutting|75|link=yes}} }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Quests required |- | {{Checklist|smallindent=yes|notoggleparent=yes| *[[Desert Treasure]] **[[Priest in Peril]] **[[Waterfall Quest]] **[[Temple of Ikov]] **[[The Tourist Trap]] **[[The Dig Site]] ***[[Druidic Ritual]] **[[Troll Stronghold]] ***[[Death Plateau]] }} |} {| class="wikitable lighttable qc-active diary-table" style=width:750px; data-diary-name="Wilderness" data-diary-tier="Elite" ! style="width:50%;" | Task ! style="width:50%;" | Requirements |- |1. Kill [[Callisto]], [[Venenatis]] & [[Vet'ion]].
'''''Note:''' Completing any other task, including those from other diaries, will reset the progress for this task. | *[[Combat equipment]] |- |2. Teleport to [[Ghorrock]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Desert Treasure]] *{{SCP|Magic|96|link=y}} and means to cast [[Ghorrock Teleport]] ({{RuneReq|Law=2|Water=8}}) |- |3. [[Raw dark crab|Fish]] and cook a [[dark crab]] in the [[Resource Area]]. | *{{SCP|Fishing|85|link=y}} and {{SCP|Cooking|90|link=y}} *[[Lobster pot]], [[dark fishing bait]] and 7500 [[coins]] (or 6000/3750 if the medium/hard diary rewards have been claimed) |- |4. Smith a [[rune scimitar]] from scratch in the [[Resource Area]].
''You must kill two [[Runite Golem]]s and mine them, then smelt the ore in the nearby furnace and smith the scimitar on the anvil.'' | *{{SCP|Mining|85|link=y}} and {{SCP|Smithing|90|link=y}} *[[Weaponry]], any [[pickaxe]], [[hammer]], 16 [[coal]] and 7500 [[coins]] (or 6000/3750 if the medium/hard diary rewards have been claimed) |- |5. Steal from the [[Chest (Rogues' Castle)]]. | *{{SCP|Thieving|84|link=y}} |- |6. Slay a [[spiritual mage]] inside the [[Wilderness God Wars Dungeon]]. | *{{SCP|Slayer|83|link=y}} and either {{SCP|Agility|60|link=y}} or {{SCP|Strength|60|link=y}} *[[Weaponry]] and [[God item|God equipment]] to keep the gods' followers passive. |- |7. Cut and burn some [[magic logs]] in the [[Resource Area]]. | *{{SCP|Woodcutting|75|link=y}} and {{SCP|Firemaking|75|link=y}} *Any [[axe]], [[tinderbox]] and 7500 [[coins]] (or 6000/3750 if the medium/hard diary rewards have been claimed) |} ===Rewards=== *[[Wilderness sword 4]] **Unlimited free teleports to the [[Fountain of Rune]] *[[Antique lamp]] worth 50,000 experience in any skill above 70 *Free entry to the [[Resource Area]] *All [[dragon bones]] drops in the [[Wilderness]] are noted. ('''Note:''' This does not include the [[King Black Dragon]], as his lair is not in the Wilderness.) **Noted [[lava dragon bones]] can be toggled by speaking to the [[Lesser Fanatic]]. *50 random free runes from [[Lundail]] once per day *Increased [[raw dark crab|dark crab]] catch rate ==Changes== {{Subject changes header}} {{Subject changes |date = 16 July 2015 |update = Duel Arena Rework |change = Fixed misspelling of "receive" in Ardougne, Karamja, Morytania and Wilderness Diaries. }} {{Subject changes |date = 30 April 2015 |update = Mutagens, Mo & Much More |change = You must now kill each of the demi-bosses and wilderness bosses to complete each of the respective tasks. }} {{Subject changes footer}} {{Achievement diary}}
